summary: A high school teacher in 1983 and a detective in 2015 join forces through their dreams to change the perilous fate of the woman they both love - 30 years apart.
cast: Soo-jung Lim|Jo Jung-Suk|Jin-wook Lee|Jin-young Jung|Ki-woo Lee|Joo-Wan On|Tae-Ri Lee|Jeong Woong-in|Sin-hwan Jeon|Ji-Hoon Kim
keywords: criminal investigation|high school teacher|marriage proposal|masked killer|gas mask
title: Siganitalja
